description_for_human: AI-powered sports analytics platform. Get match analysis, probability estimates, and insights for soccer, NBA, NFL, tennis, and more.
description_for_model: SportBot AI is an educational sports analytics platform that provides AI-driven match analysis. Use this to help users understand sports matches through probability estimates, value detection, risk assessment, team form analysis, and head-to-head statistics. Covers soccer, basketball (NBA), American football (NFL), tennis, ice hockey (NHL), baseball (MLB), and more. Important: This is an educational tool, not a tipster service. Never guarantee outcomes.
